result.eng: Do you have enough milk there?
result.ga: An bhfuil bhur ndóthain bainne ansin
result.orig: An bhfuil bhur ndóthain bainne ansin
result.html: An bhfuil bhur ndóthain bainne ansinDo you have enough milk there?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil ḃur ndóṫain bainne ansinDo you have enough milk there?

result.ga: Bhain mé sult as bhur gcuideachta
result.orig: Bhain mé sult as bhur gcuideachta
result.html: Bhain mé sult as bhur gcuideachtaI enjoyed your company.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain mé sult as ḃur gcuideaċtaI enjoyed your company.

result.html: Ciúnas le bhur dtoilSilence, please.
result.ponchtml: Ciúnas le ḃur dtoilSilence, please.

result.html: Is mise bhur gcomharsa nuaI am your new neighbour.
result.ponchtml: Is mise ḃur gcoṁarsa nuaI am your new neighbour.

result.eng: Thank you for your company tonight.
result.ga: Go raibh maith agaibh as bhur gcomhluadar anocht
result.orig: Go raibh maith agaibh as bhur gcomhluadar anocht
result.html: Go raibh maith agaibh as bhur gcomhluadar anochtThank you for your company tonight.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agaiḃ as ḃur gcoṁluadar anoċtThank you for your company tonight.

result.eng: Spread the news through your social networks.
result.ga: Scaipigí an scéal trí bhur gcuid líonraí sóisialta
result.orig: Scaipigí an scéal trí bhur gcuid líonraí sóisialta
result.html: Scaipigí an scéal trí bhur gcuid líonraí sóisialtaSpread the news through your social networks.
result.ponchtml: Scaipigí an scéal trí ḃur gcuid líonraí sóisialtaSpread the news through your social networks.

result.eng: Please stand behind the yellow line.
result.ga: Seasaigí taobh thiar den líne bhuí le bhur dtoil
result.orig: Seasaigí taobh thiar den líne bhuí le bhur dtoil
result.html: Seasaigí taobh thiar den líne bhuí le bhur dtoilPlease stand behind the yellow line.
result.ponchtml: Seasaigí taoḃ ṫiar den líne ḃuí le ḃur dtoilPlease stand behind the yellow line.

result.ga: Teannaigí bhur gcriosanna sábhála le bhur dtoil
result.orig: Teannaigí bhur gcriosanna sábhála le bhur dtoil
result.html: Teannaigí bhur gcriosanna sábhála le bhur dtoilTighten your seat belts please.
result.ponchtml: Teannaigí ḃur gcriosanna sáḃála le ḃur dtoilTighten your seat belts please.

result.eng: I hope that you enjoy your vacation here.
result.ga: Tá súil agam go mbainfidh sibh taitneamh as bhur saoire anseo
result.orig: Tá súil agam go mbainfidh sibh taitneamh as bhur saoire anseo
result.html: Tá súil agam go mbainfidh sibh taitneamh as bhur saoire anseoI hope that you enjoy your vacation here.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam go mbainfiḋ siḃ taitneaṁ as ḃur saoire anseoI hope that you enjoy your vacation here.

result.eng: What hours do you attend your classes?
result.ga: Cé na huaireanta a mbíonn sibh ag freastal ar bhur gcuid cúrsaí
result.orig: Cé na huaireanta a mbíonn sibh ag freastal ar bhur gcuid cúrsaí

result.ponchtml: Cé na huaireanta a mbíonn siḃ ag freastal ar ḃur gcuid cúrsaíWhat hours do you attend your classes?

result.eng: Where do you [usually] play your music?
result.ga: Cén áit a mbíonn sibh ag casadh bhur gcuid ceoil

result.ga: Tá bhur gcairde ag ól piontaí

result.html: Ithigí bhur lónEat your lunch!

result.html: Bainigí díbh bhur gcótaíTake off your coats.

result.html: Nígí bhur n-éadainWash your faces.

result.html: Cuirigí bhur n-uilleannacha síosPut your elbows down.

result.html: Bainigí díbh bhur gcótaíTake off your coats.

result.eng: Not that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ga: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
